<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hat of Disguise](/Equipment.aspx?ID=442)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 611 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn headwear

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ordinary-looking hat allows you to cloak yourself in illusions.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> 1 minute (Interact);  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The hat casts a 1st-level [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) spell on you. While setting up the disguise, you can magically alter the hat to appear as a comb, ribbon, helm, or other piece of headwear.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"

pfs="Standard"
>
Hat of Disguise (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 611 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 340 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You can activate the hat as a 2-action activity, you can activate it any number of times per day, and the _illusory disguise_ is 2nd level.
